page.title: 12VILLAGE OCCASIONS-BLEWBURY
page.content: ONE OF THE MAIN EVENTS IN THE VILLAGE IS THE PLAY WHICH TAKES PLACE EVERY SUMMER IN THE GARDEN OF ORCHARD DENE HOUSE.PEOPLE OF ALL AGES AND TALENTS TAKE PART.ANOTHER IMPORTANT EVENT IS THE BLEWBURY FESTIVAL.THIS ONLY TAKES PLACE EVERY TWO YEARS AND COVERS THREE WEEK-ENDS.INCLUDED IN THIS IS THE FLOWER FESTIVAL IN ST MICHAEL'S CHURCH, A GARDEN PARTY AND CONCERT AT ASHBROOK HOUSE,A VICTORIAN STREET MARKET, EXHIBITIONS AND VISITS OF OPEN HOUSES AND GARDENS.ONE OF THE TRADITIONS OF THE CHURCH IS THE BLESSING OF ANIMALS ON ST FRANCIS DAY AT ASHBROOK HOUSE.THE VILLAGE BONFIRE ON THE FIFTH OF NOVEMBER IS HELD AT ORCHARD DENE AND THERE IS AN ANNUAL FESTIVAL HARVEST SUPPER IN THE LOCAL PRIMARY SCHOOL.THE VILLAGE HALL IS THE CENTRE FOR VARIOUS SPORTING ACTIVITIES,COMMITTEE MEETINGS. VARIOUS CLUBS MAKE GOOD USE OF THE HALL
